name: iOS Browser, View Controller & Smart Banners
description:
I've found these very useful when prototyping flows from app to web and visa versa. Hopefully you will also find them useful and they save you time too!


Use cases could include:

  • Safari Browsers: Mocking up mobile web designs to give an idea of how your site will look on a device.
  • Safari View Controller: Promoting external weblinks inside your app. For example collecting feedback via a survey link.
  • iOS Smart Banners:Discovering and downloading your app via your website
